channel.title: ~~~ Need Help :) ~~~
channel.description: hey ok i want to stop Xlogging. i was wondering how to add it so when some one is attacking a player or npc and log out it wont let them log out. any 1 got an idea?

item.title: ~~~ Need Help :) ~~~
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“recker450, post:5, topic:360691”]add an int in player.java like
public int logout = 0;
and in like logout
make it check it like this
if (logout > 0) {
sM(“you may not logout since you were recently in combat.”);
}

and then in process make it go down
something like this
if(logout > 0) {
logout --;
}

and then in the attacking packets
add something like this when you pk
logout = 10; //to wait 10 seconds

if you dont understand i basically wrote up a tutorial right now or a snippet[/quote]

NO. There’s classes in the java library that have timer methods for your disposal. There’s no reason to increment and decrement an integer for a ‘timer’.

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/misc/timer.html

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~ Need Help :) ~~~
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

add an int in player.java like
public int logout = 0;
and in like logout
make it check it like this
if (logout > 0) {
sM(“you may not logout since you were recently in combat.”);
}

and then in process make it go down
something like this
if(logout > 0) {
logout --;
}

and then in the attacking packets
add something like this when you pk
logout = 10; //to wait 10 seconds

if you dont understand i basically wrote up a tutorial right now or a snippet

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~ Need Help :) ~~~
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

b15:

sweet thanks so much! im now on the right track. does any one have the actual code to add in each place…

You have to do it yourself. If you want to learn about if-statements and booleans then here’s a link.

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/if.html

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/expressions.html

Just trust me, you’ll learn so much from just reading for an hour. A lot of code you don’t understand will make sense after learning from those tutorials.

Read full topic

item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

add an timer in case 73: and case 249: (attack player & with magic) (case 131 is magic on npc)
then make it check in the logout button or void
that checks if you had pk and will need to wait
